body:
Unfortunately this week, there wasn't any Friday event. To make up for this I am hosting a Saturday event instead! This events theme is the 80's and 90's music.

When is it?
The event will be held this Saturday, at 6:00 PM EST, 3:00 PM PST or 10:00AM AEDT 
There is no specific end time!

What do you do?
If this is your first time ever using plug.dj, you will need to sign up. Go to their page here:

https://plug.dj/dashboard

Follow the instructions to create a profile.
Keep in mind that once you create a username, you cannot change it in the future, so do not impersonate others.

I already have a profile, where do I go?
We have an official plug.dj hangout. If you're already logged into your profile, go to this link right here!

https://plug.dj/avicus


Once you "plug" into the hangout, create a playlist of songs by searching up your favourites on YouTube, and then join the wait list! Once it's your turn to DJ, everyone in the hangout can dance, listen, and have a good time to your song!

What Types of Music is allowed?
For this event, we will encourage users to play 80's and 90's music. 
But please nothing inappropriate, violent, gory, or racist.
Get creative with what you share! 

Who is hosting this event?
Me, along with any of the plug.dj team members that can make it .

title: « Saturday Avicadian DJ event! »

replies.body: I encourage all Avicus users to participate in this event!

replies.body: I'm sorry but I won't be able to make it to this event as I have various problems going on at the moment. I have other members of the plug.dj team hosting it. Sorry guys!
replies.body_tagged: I'm sorry but I won't be able to make it to this event as I have various problems going on at the moment. I have other members of the plug.dj team hosting it. Sorry guys!

replies.body: You do not have to go to the dashboard! You can register at plug.dj/avicus!  Btw, sorry I missed it, I wont be on at all this week.
